title: Port Reconnection Backoff Pattern
details:
v1.6.3.10-v5 implemented exponential backoff for port reconnection in content.js. Pattern uses:
- Initial delay: 150ms (midpoint of 100-200ms range)
- Backoff multiplier: 1.5x per retry
- Maximum delay: 8000ms cap
- Jitter: Â±20% randomization to prevent thundering herd
- Counter reset on successful connection
Key constants: INITIAL_RECONNECT_DELAY_MS, MAX_RECONNECT_DELAY_MS, RECONNECT_BACKOFF_MULTIPLIER, RECONNECT_JITTER_RANGE
